snippet.title: Machinicide - Release date announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1897010/Machinicide/
Twitter: https://x.com/StepanMeister
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/meister351.bsky.social

Machinicide is a boomer shooter with imm sim and bullet hell elements. Reduce all evil robots to scraps with a huge arsenal of futuristic weapons and abilities, such as telekinesis, changing of gravity and many more.

#Machinicide #boomershooter #immersivesim #bullethell #fps #shootergames
